Topic.Title: Doctor Wrenclaw's Adventures of Maria Annette - an imaginary board game

Posts.EditableText:
I almost wanted to categorize this as a romance or a mystery, however, I wasn't sure it fit exactly into either. I wasn't sure what a simulation would be. This may be a simulation of a dice, card, and board game, but there are no cards, only presents, and it is also a fairytale. If you can be bothered to read popups, it is a story to read and extra points, but you can play all the way to the end without reading them.

Keep the little doll safe and well.
(I think it might be a romance.)
https://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/_mt1kbzllumapp4yor78iw/doctor-wrenclaws-adventures-of-maria-annette

Posts.EditableText: Let me know if you run into a bug that I can have to fix. Thanks for helping me find it if it's there.  I know there is a missing stone on Area 9 East. Sorry. I thought I had corrected everything. I want to know about anything else. As soon as I fix a thing, my listing will - will it not disappear? I don't know, but tell me about anything you see, and I will fix everything at one time, soon.

Posts.EditableText:
If you are asking will updating your game remove its categorization, the answer is no, the game will remain in its category.

Source: I myself have been updating my categorized games, changing their names and changing listing picture as well.
Posts.HTML:

Posts.EditableText: Thanks. I just updated with my fingers crossed, as I had not seen this, yet. I was delighted when the label stayed.
